column2: tab_All <- df2 %>% select(-Master) %>% table() %>% as_tibble() %>% rename(Phase = ".", Count = n)
tab_M_Yes <- df2 %>% filter(Master == "Yes") %>% table() %>% as_tibble() %>% rename(Count = n)
tab_M_No <- df2 %>% filter(Master == "No") %>% table() %>% as_tibble() %>% rename(Count = n)
title_Text <- 'Total Number of Roads Capital Projects by Phase'
